title: Meter Maid
desc:
Post 14
***Parking Ticket***
During the evening phase, choose a response. Its score will be reduced by 5% if they are a law-abiding town member. The target will be notified of this action and your Badge Number (your exact score).
***Pepper Spray** (1x, charge 75%)*
The recipients of your Parking Tickets tend to get angry. At night, you may roleblock your target from the previous evening.
***Salary** (Passive)*
You receive a 5% score boost every even-numbered night.
***Ticket Quota** (passive)*
If you fail to issue a ticket at night, your score is reduced by 5%.
